actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution relating to an International Space Year in 1992.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should: (1) endorse the concept of an International Space Year (ISY) for 1992; (2) consider discussing an ISY with other foreign leaders; (3) direct the Administrator of NASA to initiate interagency and international discussions to explore the opportunities for an ISY, including international missions and related research and educational activities; and (4) submit a report to the Congress with respect to an ISY.

titles.title: A joint resolution relating to an International Space Year in 1992.
